abstract: Wall Street on 9/11: After the destruction of the data center of eSpeed, an electronic trading platform, the company’s chief information officer worked around the clock to restore it.
snippet: Wall Street on 9/11: After the destruction of the data center of eSpeed, an electronic trading platform, the company’s chief information officer worked around the clock to restore it.
lead_paragraph: Joseph C. Noviello is the executive vice president and chief products architect at Cantor Fitzgerald. He was a senior executive at eSpeed on Sept. 11, 2001.
